channel.title: Hmmmm need a ::pk area and command please help
channel.description: Ok, I have found my pking spot its in taverly dungeon close to the fire obelisk... Anyway I wanted to add pking and a safe zone? Could some one tell me a code for a command to go to pk?? and a code to make a safezone? Thnx for the help :DD

item.title: Hmmmm need a ::pk area and command please help
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

Search for noclip, or another command, then add above it;

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pk")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx; sendMessage("INSERT MESSAGE"); } }

xxxx = your coords.

Read full topic
item.source: Hmmmm need a ::pk area and command please help
